name: Challenge Game for Paint Jam Long
name_original: Challenge Game for Paint Jam Long
description:
I went for all of the challenges because they were there.

Now you can go for all of the challenges in this game!

(For art, I allowed myself to open my eyes to select colors, and i allowed background fill before drawing anything)

Free comic sans font by QD Fonts at (https://www.fontspace.com/qd-better-comic-sans-font-f41648)

I do not own nor did I create the pygame library used in this program
